title: Rounding
alt: I've developed a novel propulsion system powered by loss of precision in unit conversion.
transcript:
[Cueball, wearing a bike helmet and standing next to a bike, is speaking to Megan.]Cueball: I can ride my bike at 45 MPH.
Cueball: If you round.[To their right and proceeding down the rest of the comic, arrows show conversions from one measure into another unit.]17 MPH
8 meters/sec
16 knots
5 fathoms/sec
3 furlongs/min
6 fathoms/sec
40 KPH
22 knots
41 KPH
204 furlongs/hr
26 MPH
12 M/S
4 furlongs/min
15 yards/sec
8 fathoms/sec
15 M/S
34 MPH
5 furlongs/min
33 knots
19 yards/sec
10 fathoms/sec
36 knots
6 furlongs/min
45 MPH
